message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 70 and you take 30. Let's see if we can do better in the next round.
You were too generous in the first round, let's meet in the middle again.
I'm not budging much from my original offer, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Take 40 and I'll take 60.
You're not giving me much, but I'll take this for now. It's getting late in the game.
I'm not going to give you more than 35. Take it or leave it. Time's running out.
I'm not falling for your lowball offers. I'll take a slightly better deal, but not much.
This is my final offer. Take 30 and I'll take 70. If you don't accept, we'll both walk away with nothing.
